alert.note: Alert for Lyman (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 10:09PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lyman County through 1145 PM CDT... At 1108 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Vivian, or 9 miles west of Presho, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... 5 Mile Corner around 1115 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
